mapper.select: select count(checkout_entry_serial) from m_checkout_entry where creation_date = date('now', 'localtime') and checkout_entry_serial like #{prefix}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into m_checkout_entry ( checkout_entry_serial, partner_company_id, invoice_type, payment_method, payment_number, payment_amount, bank_account_id, total_amount, is_rounded, rounded_amount, debt, service_fee, remark, drawer, creation_date, checkout_date, money_entry_serial, department_id ) values ( #{checkoutEntrySerial}, #{partnerCompanyID}, #{invoiceType}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentNumber}, #{paymentAmount}, #{bankAccountID}, #{totalAmount}, #{isRounded}, #{roundedAmount}, #{debt}, #{serviceFee}, #{remark}, #{drawer}, date('now', 'localtime'), #{checkoutDate}, #{moneyEntrySerial}, #{departmentID} )
mapper.select: select checkout_entry_serial, payment_method, payment_number, payment_amount, c.bank_account_id, b.name as bank_account_name, is_rounded, rounded_amount, debt, service_fee, c.remark, drawer, is_verified from m_checkout_entry as c left join c_bank_account as b on c.bank_account_id = b.bank_account_id where checkout_entry_serial = #{serial}
mapper.update: update m_checkout_entry set payment_method = #{paymentMethod}, payment_number = #{paymentNumber}, payment_amount = #{paymentAmount}, bank_account_id = #{bankAccountID}, is_rounded = #{isRounded}, rounded_amount = #{roundedAmount}, debt = #{debt}, service_fee = #{serviceFee}, remark = #{remark}, is_modified = 1 where checkout_entry_serial = #{checkoutEntrySerial}
